description:
Every company has a mission. What's ours? To empower every person and every organization to achieve more. We believe technology can and should be a force for good and that meaningful innovation contributes to a brighter world in the future and today. Our culture doesn’t just encourage curiosity; it embraces it. Each day we make progress together by showing up as our authentic selves. We show up with a learn-it-all mentality. We show up cheering on others, knowing their success doesn't diminish our own. We show up every day open to learning our own biases, changing our behavior, and inviting in differences. Because impact matters. 

Microsoft operates in 190 countries and is made up of approximately 228,000 passionate employees worldwide.

updates.text:
Curious about the newest AI features designed to support you at work and beyond? October’s edition of The Monthly Tech-In has got you covered. ✨ 
 
This month, we explore Microsoft Copilot capabilities, and new experiences for Copilot+ PCs and Windows 11. We also highlight two reports on how we’re working to safeguard your data, as well as advance Microsoft’s commitment to diversity and inclusion.

The pace of AI innovation today continues to be extraordinary, and at Microsoft we remain focused on helping our customers and partners embrace it to make progress in ways that matter to them. By infusing the most advanced AI technology across every product we build—combined with our unparalleled partner ecosystem and co-innovation approach—we are helping achieve our mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.
 
I am proud to share over 100 customer stories from the past quarter alone that show how we are helping customers and partners accelerate AI Transformation—no matter where they are on their journey. I am also pleased to highlight ten stories that illustrate in depth how Copilots have yielded real business results for our customers and share their experiences in their own words.
 
Check out my latest blog to learn more: https://lnkd.in/gfyGH3RN. I look forward to the ways we will partner together to help you achieve more with AI.

If you’re trying to come up with some last-minute office party costume ideas, Copilot can be an excellent costume designer.
 
Try this prompt: Please create a short list of culturally relevant costumes for 2024. Reference recent iconic pop culture moments and include a list of items to purchase to execute the costume.

Today, I shared my annual letter to shareholders, and I invite you to read it. I've been reflecting on how we stay relevant and continue reinventing ourselves in this age of AI. This includes our deep commitment to security, quality, and AI innovation – for our customers and the world.

Chief Diversity Officer Lindsay-Rae McIntyre reflects on Microsoft’s history over the last half-century, our uniquely inclusive mission, and our massive ambition to serve all customers and consumers in transformational ways in her Executive Summary for this year’s Global Diversity & Inclusion Report. Explore the full report here: https://msft.it/6004WEsw8

As we release Microsoft’s 2024 Global Diversity & Inclusion Report today, we do so knowing this work is more important than ever before. In this era of AI, strengthening inclusion and removing barriers are central to how we move forward as a global society, so that every employee and ultimately every person has the access, opportunity, and skills to participate in the power and promise of technology.

In this 11th year of sharing our progress toward diversity and inclusion, our clarity of purpose continues to be directly connected to our company mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. And as we approach our 50th anniversary, we are reminded that D&I has always been at the core of our business. 

I am energized by the areas where we have accrued progress—for example in representation at some senior leader levels for women and racial and ethnic minority groups, and by the new data and insights we share for the first time this year—such as global self-identification data for employees in the disability, military, and Indigenous communities. 

With some progress, we remain focused on hiring, developing, and retaining talent to close gaps and enable our workforce to thrive. I invite you to explore my new LinkedIn newsletter, Inside Inclusion, where I talk about progress, what it takes to do this work at a global scale, and how we prioritize the work ahead. 

You can explore the full report at https://aka.ms/DIReport 

I invite you to subscribe below for future insights!

An estimated 5 billion people worldwide have unmet justice needs.  

Our 5th annual Pro Bono Report highlights how Microsoft employees and our partners are leveraging technology to scale impact to meet the access-to-justice crisis. From using the DACA Copilot to cut the time to complete DACA renewals by an estimated 90% to supporting organizations that uphold democracy, our pro bono program is helping to advance justice for all.  

Learn about our efforts to drive impactful solutions through human action and digital transformation: https://msft.it/6049WDu7z 

#HumanRights #TechForGood #Microsoft

Customers are realizing business value with Copilot and agents, transforming work across industries in the UK. Discover how UK-based businesses Unilever, Clifford Chance, and Pets at Home are deploying agents to change the game in marketing, law, and fraud detection. https://msft.it/6002WDzdO

Inspirational Storytelling from Lewis Pugh at the Microsoft AI Tour in London 🏊♂️

💜 Dive in and commit 100%. When we truly give our all, even the toughest challenges become achievable. 

💜Sometimes it takes courage to break old habits, especially when it’s the only way to get the job done. 

Here are 3 key qualities we can all develop to push past the limits and achieve extraordinary things:

🟣 Commitment
🟣 Resilience
🟣 Adaptability

When we embrace these, we’ll accomplish feats that make others say, “Wow, I didn’t think that was possible!”

Russ
Robotics AI 🟪 Unleashing human minds

#MicrosoftAITour #Inspiration #Leadership #Resilience #GrowthMindset

This morning, I had the privilege of joining Satya Nadella at the Microsoft AI Tour in London to unveil groundbreaking advancements in Copilot Studio and Dynamics 365. These new agentic capabilities are set to bring AI-first business process to every organization.

Here are the highlights:
 
1. The ability to 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐂𝐨𝐩𝐢𝐥𝐨𝐭 𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐨 will be in public preview next month.
2. We introduced 𝐭𝐞𝐧 𝐧𝐞𝐰 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝟑𝟔𝟓, designed to drive business value across sales, service, finance, and supply chain teams.
 
Copilot is your AI assistant, and Copilot Studio is where you easily create and manage agents (which you can think of as the new apps for an AI-powered world). Before long, every organization will have a constellation of agents, working on behalf of individuals, teams, or functions.
 
What excites me most about these developments is the transformative impact they will have on how businesses operate. With 60 percent of the Fortune 500 already leveraging Copilot, we're not just witnessing incremental improvements; we're seeing a fundamental shift in business paradigms. Organizations like Clifford Chance, McKinsey & Company, Pets at Home, and Thomson Reuters are already creating autonomous agents to increase revenue, reduce costs, and scale impact.

Internally at Microsoft, our own success stories are equally powerful. One of our sales teams has achieved 9.4% higher revenue per seller and closed 20% more deals. A team within our Customer Service and Support group is resolving cases nearly 12% faster. Our marketing team is seeing a 21.5% increase conversion rate on Azure.com, and our HR employee self-service agent is answering questions with 42% greater accuracy. This is just the beginning as we reimagine our business function-by-function to be AI-first, and we’ll continue to share our progress along the way.
 
Read more about today's announcements in my latest blog: https://lnkd.in/gCfTWmtn
